summary: Diff adds an Advanced Contact Lookup module (single input + Search), integrates existing frontend antifraud analysis for phone/email, adds a same-origin public-info lookup dataset with source metadata, implements offline best-effort caching (localStorage + SW precache), and surfaces it via a new Home tab. Main gaps are around i18n: some new user-facing strings are hardcoded (not sourced from the existing i18n dictionary) and translations appear to fall back to English for non-PT/EN languages rather than providing full PT/EN/ES/FR/ZH/AR/RU coverage.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add full multilingual support for all new Advanced Contact Lookup UI text across PT/EN/ES/FR/ZH/AR/RU using the existing i18n system; do not hardcode user-facing strings in components.
missing_requirements.reason: New validation/error strings are hardcoded in a utility instead of coming from the existing i18n dictionary, and the translation file summary indicates non-PT/EN languages fall back to English rather than having full translations.
evidence: frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts (summary: "with other languages using English as fallback")
